item.description:
EclipsianStar and her friends are out for a Saturday night at Ola Martinis in
Orange.

Are there any Coffee Talkers who want to take a ride to
Orange and hang out with them?

Great atmosphere, great company and great conversation.

Start March right by going out and relaxing.

Those who cannot be around alcohol should not attend this
Meet Up.

Please do not forget about RSVPing for
the Village Inn Diner in East Haven on
Sunday at 4.
I have been there a few times and it has
a pleasant atmosphere and great food.

http://coffee.meetup....

coffee.meetup.com/397/calendar/7256770/

Mike B
Assistant Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: This is EclipsianStars meet up. I have the feeling that you will probably hear her and her friends where ever you are in the Cafe
item.why: It is the start of a new month, so if you have a time go out and have fun.
item.name: Martinis & Coffee Talk Get together
